研究发现，一周的剧烈骑行可能会燃烧腹部脂肪，但体重不会大幅减轻一周的极限自行车运动显着降低了中年自行车手的内脏脂肪含量，强调了运动在身体成分管理中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/A-week-of-intense-cycling-may-burn-abdominal-fat-without-major-weight-loss-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/A-week-of-intense-cycling-may-burn-abdominal-fat-without-major-weight-loss-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55911245-2855-4de8-b88a-2e57c87a02cf Mon, 23 Sep 2024 06:06:00 -0400 A week of intense cycling may burn abdominal fat without major weight loss, study finds
血液 microRNA 可以预测阿尔茨海默氏病从轻度认知障碍转变为痴呆症这项研究将血清 miRNA 特征确定为阿尔茨海默病的有前景的生物标志物，增强了 MCI 转化为 AD 的预测，具有临床相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Blood-microRNAs-can-predict-conversion-from-mild-cognitive-impairment-to-dementia-due-to-Alzheimere28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Blood-microRNAs-can-predict-conversion-from-mild-cognitive-impairment-to-dementia-due-to-Alzheimere28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=033fa93e-e931-4164-beb5-e7d26baf4030 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 05:53:00 -0400 Blood microRNAs can predict conversion from mild cognitive impairment to dementia due to Alzheimer’s disease
曲普坦类药物比最近上市的更昂贵的药物更能缓解偏头痛一项荟萃分析显示曲坦类药物是最有效的急性偏头痛治疗方法，强调了将其纳入世界卫生组织基本药物清单的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Triptans-better-at-relleving-migraine-pain-than-recently-marketed-and-more-expective-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Triptans-better-at-relifying-migraine-pain-than-recently-marketed-and-more-expective-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45fcc3bc-6b51-4006-bee8-d9ed9e764252 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 05:10:00 -0400 Triptans better at relieving migraine pain than recently marketed and more expensive drugs

3DHISTECH 推出新旗舰 P480 第二代，采用偏光技术3DHISTECH 推出其最新旗舰产品 P480 第二代。凭借 P480 十年来的卓越研究和诊断经验，P480 第二代引入了新功能并采用了显着的增强功能，以满足现代数字化实验室不断变化的需求和紧迫性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/3DHISTECH-launches-the-new-flagship-P480-2nd-Generation-powered-with-polarization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/3DHISTECH-launches-the-new-flagship-P480-2nd-Generation-powered-with-polarization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51ac0b51-a06e-46be-987f-56ee756adb73 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 01:16:00 -0400 3DHISTECH launches the new flagship P480 2nd Generation, powered with polarization

利拉鲁肽激活关键脑回路以引发肥胖者减肥研究人员揭示了利拉鲁肽如何靶向特定的大脑区域，通过 GLP-1 受体激活来抑制食欲并促进显着减肥。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Liraglutide-activates-key-brain- Circuits-to-trigger-weight-loss-in-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Liraglutide-activates-key-brain- Circuits-to-trigger-weight-loss-in-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82608f95-d3e7-408a-81eb-ad4bc3d57f4e Mon, 23 Sep 2024 00:48:00 -0400 Liraglutide activates key brain circuits to trigger weight loss in obesity
